fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, spend 1 Insanity to Murder a player, attacking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with 2 Insanity.
- At 0 Insanity, you become "Sane".
- When you first become Sane, learn of the roles you killed while Insane. Choose one to become, gaining their abilities and attributes and win condition. All players are informed that the Madman has assumed an identity.
- If you win with your chosen faction, you steal the victory from them, gaining a solo victory.
